00036  */

00038 //#define OGRE_NO_DX_INPUT
00039 
00040 
00041 /* If you don't whant your build to request dxinput8, 
00042     for example in case u whant to run on a DirectX7 machine.
00043     This is stil request  DirectX 8 sdk for building, but the binary requires
00044     only DirectX 7
00045 */
00046 //#define DX7INPUTONLY 
00047 
00048 #ifndef OGRE_NO_DX_INPUT
00049 
00050 #ifdef DX7INPUTONLY 
00051 #define DIRECTINPUT_VERSION 0x0700
00052 
00053 #else 
00054 
00057 #define DIRECTINPUT_VERSION 0x0800
00058 #endif 
00059 
00060 #endif // OGRE_NO_DX_INPUT
